ccre.channel

Class FloatStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.channel.FloatStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FloatInput, FloatInputPoll, FloatOutput

    public class FloatStatus
extends java.lang.Object
implements FloatOutput, FloatInput
    A virtual node that is both a FloatOutput and a FloatInput. You can modify its value, read its value, and subscribe to changes in its value. FloatStatus also provides a number of useful helper functions. By convention, most float inputs and outputs have states that range from -1.0f to 1.0f.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FloatStatus()
      Create a new FloatStatus with a value of zero.
      FloatStatus(float value)
      Create a new FloatStatus with the specified default value.
      FloatStatus(FloatOutput... targets)
      Create a new FloatStatus that automatically updates all of the specified FloatOutputs with the current state of this FloatStatus.
      FloatStatus(FloatOutput target)
      Create a new FloatStatus that automatically updates the specified FloatOutput with the current state of this FloatStatus.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float get()
      Get the current state of this float input.

      Subscribe to changes in this float input's value.

      Set the float value of this output.
      void setWhen(float value, EventInput when)
      When the specified event occurs, set the state to the specified value.
      void unsend(FloatOutput output)
      Unsubscribe from changes in this float input's value.

      • FloatStatus

        public FloatStatus()
        Create a new FloatStatus with a value of zero.

      • FloatStatus

        public FloatStatus(float value)
        Create a new FloatStatus with the specified default value.
        Parameters:
        value - The default value.

      • FloatStatus

        public FloatStatus(FloatOutput target)
        Create a new FloatStatus that automatically updates the specified FloatOutput with the current state of this FloatStatus. This is the same as creating a new FloatStatus and then adding the FloatOutput as a target.
        Parameters:
        target - The FloatOutput to automatically update.
        See Also:
        send(ccre.channel.FloatOutput)

      • FloatStatus

        public FloatStatus(FloatOutput... targets)
        Create a new FloatStatus that automatically updates all of the specified FloatOutputs with the current state of this FloatStatus. This is the same as creating a new FloatStatus and then adding all of the FloatOutputs as targets.
        Parameters:
        targets - The FloatOutputs to automatically update.
        See Also:
        send(ccre.channel.FloatOutput)

      • send

        public void send(FloatOutput output)
        Description copied from interface: FloatInput
        Subscribe to changes in this float input's value. The float output will be modified whenever the value of this input changes. By convention, most float inputs and outputs have states that range from -1.0f to 1.0f. If available, the current value of the input will be written at this time.
        Specified by:
        send in interface FloatInput
        Parameters:
        output - The float output to notify when the value changes.
        See Also:
        FloatOutput.set(float), FloatInput.unsend(ccre.channel.FloatOutput)

      • unsend

        public void unsend(FloatOutput output)
        Description copied from interface: FloatInput
        Unsubscribe from changes in this float input's value. This reverses the actions of a previous send call. By convention, most float inputs and outputs have states that range from -1.0f to 1.0f.
        Specified by:
        unsend in interface FloatInput
        Parameters:
        output - The output to unsubscribe.
        See Also:
        FloatInput.send(ccre.channel.FloatOutput)
